name: Souper Dicey Cookout!
description:
You are a world-famous chef who is also a bear, and your ingredients have gone rogue! You must slice and dice your ingredients back to their forms, so you can make your famous soups! This cooking action arcade game was made in less than 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.

Featuring 4 unique kinds of soup, and 5 deliciously dangerous enemies,  Souper Dicey Cookout! is laid with fun game mechanics, beautiful pixelart graphics, an original soundtrack, and a creative take on the theme "Roll of the Dice"!

Share your score with friends and compete with one another, or take it solo and see how many soups you can make before your own ingredients destroy you! 

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys

Dice - J/Space

Throw  - K

Soups (in order of scoring): 

Egg Drop soup (3 eggs), Tomato soup (3 tomatoes and 1 onion), Chicken Noodle Soup (2 noodles and 1 chicken), Ramen (2 noodles, 1 onion, 1 egg)
